description:
After 16 years, The Cure are releasing a new album next month. A Fragile Thing is the second track to be released and it's a classic. One thing to note: This could be the last of the Black And White series - I have finally found the colour button on my new camera. Next is the microphone. Apologies. 

To hear the whole song without pauses: 
https://youtu.be/V7sZlKuh8gA?si=lWFy3olQJFzpBdBf


'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - is released in March - and we'll be going on tour:  
https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/
https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
Our new single, The Longest Kiss is here:  https://thedarkness.lnk.to/tlk 

To go behind the scenes with me or to join a monthly Zoom Call Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The Podcast. You can listen to the archives on Apple Podcast, Spotify etc: https://open.spotify.com/show/0hQYjIww4Rfaka
title: The Cure: A Fragile Thing
